name: Cybertext 2020
description:
You are fleeing - towards a goal clearly in your mind.

The road is straight, the parameters set - there is no going back.
This is your chance to shine.

Set in a deeply cyberpunky world. Inspired by Night City.

If you play the embedded version, do it in fullscreen! Also: You need to double-tap Escape there to exit the game.

Thanks for allowing me to use / Credits:

~ Engine: Unity Technologies (2021). Unity. Link
~ Logo Sound: CD Projekt RED (2013). Cyberpunk 2077 Teaser Trailer. Link
~ Soundtrack: Aques Levaro / Steffen Schreiber (2021). Hookshot. Link
~ Font: Bahn Pro Font. Link

This is an unofficial fan work and is not approved/endorsed by CD PROJEKT RED.
